data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mata-Casanova, Noel, Selfa, Jesús, Pujade-Villar, Juli (2018): Three new species of Anacharis Dalman, 1823 (Hymenoptera: Figitidae), with revised taxonomy and distribution records of Palaearctic and Indomalayan species. European Journal of Taxonomy 414: 1-25, DOI: https://doi.org/10.5852/ejt.2018.414|104 occurrences
